bibl.title: Berenike 1995. Preliminary Report of the 1995 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert.
bibl.note: tabl., figg., cartes, plans et 2 cartes dépl. h. t.

Pp. 197-203: 8. Greek and Latin Texts, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. Edition of O. Berenike Inv. 3273-A. Receipt, Ist century B.C. - Pp. 357-409: 21. Survey of the Hinterland, by S.E. SIDEBOTHAM and R.E. ZITTERKOPF. Graffiti (2 in Latin, 1 in Greek). - Greek inscriptions from Bir 'Iayyan, forthcoming in ChrEg 71 (1996) No. 142.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E. and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1995. Preliminary Report of the 1995 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert.
Leiden, Research School CNWS - School of Asian, African, and Amerindian Studies, 1996, 8°, [xi]-483 pp., tabl., figg., cartes, plans et 2 cartes dépl. h. t. ISBN 90-73782-41-4. Hfl. 85.

Pp. 197-203: 8. Greek and Latin Texts, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. Edition of O. Berenike Inv. 3273-A. Receipt, Ist century B.C. - Pp. 357-409: 21. Survey of the Hinterland, by S.E. SIDEBOTHAM and R.E. ZITTERKOPF. Graffiti (2 in Latin, 1 in Greek). - Greek inscriptions from Bir 'Iayyan, forthcoming in ChrEg 71 (1996) No. 142.

C.R. par Colin Adams, JHS 119 (1999) pp. 218-219 [concerne aussi: Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1994 (Leiden, 1995)]. - Valerie Maxfield, JRA 13 (2000) pp. 698-702 [concerne aussi: Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1994 (Leiden, 1995); - Berenike 1996 (Leiden, 1998)].
